title: Silk inverse opals
abstract: Periodic nanostructures provide the facility to control and manipulate the flow of light through their lattices. Three-dimensional photonic crystals enable the controlled design of structural colour, which can be varied by infiltrating the structure with different (typically liquid) fillers. Here, we report three-dimensional photonic crystals composed entirely of a purified natural protein (silk fibroin). The biocompatibility of this protein, as well as its favourable material properties and ease of biological functionalization, present opportunities for otherwise unattainable device applications such as bioresorbable integration of structural colour within living tissue or lattice functionalization by means of organic and inorganic material doping. We present a silk inverse opal that demonstrates a pseudo-photonic bandgap in the visible spectrum and show its associated structural colour beneath biological tissue. We also leverage silk's facile dopability to manufacture a gold nanoparticle silk inverse opal and demonstrate patterned heating mediated by enhancement of nanoparticle absorption at the band-edge frequency of the photonic crystal.
abstract_cn: 周期性纳米结构提供了控制和操纵通过其晶格的光流的便利。三维光子晶体可实现结构颜色的受控设计，可通过使用不同的（通常为液体）填料渗透结构来改变结构颜色。在这里，我们报告三维光子晶体完全由纯天然蛋白质（丝素蛋白）组成。这种蛋白质的生物相容性及其有利的材料性能和生物功能化的简便性，为其他原本无法实现的设备应用提供了机会，例如生物组织内部结构颜色的生物可吸收整合或通过有机和无机材料掺杂实现晶格功能化。我们提出了一种丝绸反蛋白石，该蛋白石在可见光谱中显示出伪光子带隙，并在生物组织下显示其相关的结构色。我们还利用丝绸的易掺杂性来制造金纳米粒子丝绸反蛋白石，并演示了通过在光子晶体的带边频率处增强纳米粒子吸收来介导的图案化加热。</ p>

title: Highly efficient water splitting by a dual-absorber tandem cell
title_cn: 通过双吸收串联池进行高效水分解
abstract: Photoelectrochemical water-splitting devices, which use solar energy to convert water into hydrogen and oxygen, have been investigated for decades. Multijunction designs are most efficient, as they can absorb enough solar energy and provide sufficient free energy for water cleavage. However, a balance exists between device complexity, cost and efficiency. Water splitters fabricated using triple-junction amorphous silicon or III–V semiconductors have demonstrated reasonable efficiencies, but at high cost and high device complexity. Simpler approaches using oxide-based semiconductors in a dual-absorber tandem approach have reported solar-to-hydrogen (STH) conversion efficiencies only up to 0.3% (ref. ). Here, we present a device based on an oxide photoanode and a dye-sensitized solar cell, which performs unassisted water splitting with an efficiency of up to 3.1% STH. The design relies on carefully selected redox mediators for the dye-sensitized solar cell and surface passivation techniques and catalysts for the oxide-based photoanodes.
abstract_cn: 利用太阳能将水转化为氢和氧的光电化学水分解装置已经研究了数十年。多结设计最有效，因为它们可以吸收足够的太阳能并提供足够的自由能进行水裂解。但是，设备复杂性，成本和效率之间存在平衡。使用三结非晶硅或III＆V半导体制造的分水器已显示出合理的效率，但成本高且设备复杂。在双吸收器串联方法中使用基于氧化物的半导体的更简单方法已经报告了太阳能到氢（STH）的转换效率仅高达0.3％（ref。＆＃160;）。在这里，我们介绍了一种基于氧化物光电阳极和染料敏化太阳能电池的设备，该设备可以进行无辅助的水分解，效率高达3.1％STH。该设计依赖于染料敏化太阳能电池和表面钝化技术的精心选择的氧化还原介体，以及基于氧化物的光阳极的催化剂。

title: Attosecond lighthouses from plasma mirrors
abstract: The nonlinear interaction of an intense femtosecond laser pulse with matter can lead to the emission of a train of sub-laser-cycle—attosecond—bursts of short-wavelength radiation. Much effort has been devoted to producing isolated attosecond pulses, as these are better suited to real-time imaging of fundamental electronic processes. Successful methods developed so far rely on confining the nonlinear interaction to a single sub-cycle event. Here, we demonstrate for the first time a simpler and more universal approach to this problem, applied to nonlinear laser–plasma interactions. By rotating the instantaneous wavefront direction of an intense few-cycle laser field as it interacts with a solid-density plasma, we separate the nonlinearly generated attosecond pulse train into multiple beams of isolated attosecond pulses propagating in different and controlled directions away from the plasma surface. This unique method produces a manifold of isolated attosecond pulses, ideally synchronized for initiating and probing ultrafast electron motion in matter.
abstract_cn: 飞秒强激光脉冲与物质的非线性相互作用会导致发射短波长辐射的亚激光周期“亚秒”脉冲串。已经做出了很多努力来产生孤立的阿秒脉冲，因为它们更适合于基本电子过程的实时成像。迄今为止开发的成功方法依赖于将非线性相互作用限制在单个子周期事件中。在这里，我们首次展示了一种更简单，更通用的解决此问题的方法，该方法适用于非线性激光等离子体相互作用。通过旋转强烈的几个周期激光场与固体密度等离子体相互作用时的瞬时波阵面方向，我们将非线性生成的阿秒脉冲序列分离为多个独立的阿秒脉冲束，它们以不同且受控的方向传播，远离等离子体表面。这种独特的方法产生了一系列孤立的阿秒脉冲，理想情况下可以同步这些脉冲，以启动和探测物质中的超快电子运动。

title: Superdiffusion in optically controlled active media
title_cn: 在光控活性介质中的超扩散
abstract: Active media are complex systems driven by both thermal fluctuations and additional energy sources and are encountered in a variety of phenomena including mobile bacteria, protein diffusion or turbulent flows. However, studying the non-equilibrium dynamics of active media is often difficult because of their size and complexity. Here, we demonstrate that an active medium can be realized and controlled optically through dynamic coupling between multiply scattered light and colloidal particles. As a result of a strong light–matter interaction, the particles undergo diffusion upon a spatiotemporal random potential that leads to an apparent superdiffusion over timescales controlled by, among other things, both the input power and particle size. This model could serve as a convenient tool for exploring the intricacies of non-equilibrium thermodynamics of soft matter while also offering new possibilities for the coherent control of strongly coupled, complex systems.
abstract_cn: 活性介质是由热波动和附加能源共同驱动的复杂系统，并且在多种现象中遇到，包括移动细菌，蛋白质扩散或湍流。 但是，由于有源介质的大小和复杂性，通常很难对其进行研究。 在这里，我们证明了可以通过多重散射光和胶体颗粒之间的动态耦合来实现和控制光学上的活性介质。 作为强光物质相互作用的结果，粒子在时空随机电势下发生扩散，这导致在受输入功率和粒子大小控制的时间范围内出现明显的超扩散。 该模型可作为探索软物质非平衡热力学复杂性的便捷工具，同时也为强耦合，复杂系统的相干控制提供了新的可能性。</ p>

title: Nanofocusing in a metal–insulator–metal gap plasmon waveguide with a three-dimensional linear taper
title_cn: 具有三维线性锥度的金属-绝缘体-金属间隙等离子体激元波导中的纳米聚焦
abstract: The development of techniques for efficiently confining photons on the deep sub-wavelength spatial scale will revolutionize scientific research and engineering practices. The efficient coupling of light into extremely small nanofocusing devices has been a major challenge in on-chip nanophotonics because of the need to overcome various loss mechanisms and the on-chip nanofabrication challenges. Here, we demonstrate experimentally the achievement of highly efficient nanofocusing in an Au–SiO2–Au gap plasmon waveguide using a carefully engineered three-dimensional taper. The dimensions of the SiO2 layer, perpendicular to the direction of wave propagation, taper linearly below 100 nm. Our simulations suggest that the three-dimensional linear-tapering approach could focus 830 nm light into a 2 × 5 nm2 area with ≤3 dB loss and an intensity enhancement of 3.0 × 104. In a two-photon luminescence measurement, our device achieved an intensity enhancement of 400 within a 14 × 80 nm2 area, and a transmittance of 74%.
abstract_cn: 在深亚波长空间尺度上有效限制光子的技术的发展将彻底改变科学研究和工程实践。将光有效耦合到极小的纳米聚焦装置中已成为芯片上纳米光子学的主要挑战，因为需要克服各种损耗机制和芯片上纳米制造的挑战。在这里，我们通过实验证明了使用精心设计的三维锥度在Au＆＃8211; SiO 2 ＆＃8211; Au间隙等离子体激元波导中实现高效纳米聚焦的效果。垂直于波传播方向的SiO 2 层的尺寸在100＆＃160nm以下线性减小。我们的模拟结果表明，三维线性渐缩方法可以将830＆＃160; nm光聚焦到2＆＃160;＆＃215;＆＃160; 5＆＃160; nm 2 区域＃8804; 3＆＃160; dB损耗和3.0＆＃160;＆＃215;＆＃160; 10 4 的强度增强。在双光子发光测量中，我们的设备在14＆＃160;＆＃215;＆＃160; 80＆＃160; nm 2 区域内实现了400的强度增强，并且透射率达到74 ％。

title: High-speed molecular spectral imaging of tissue with stimulated Raman scattering
title_cn: 带有拉曼散射的组织高速分子光谱成像
abstract: To date, medical imaging of tissues has largely relied on time-consuming staining processes, and there is a need for rapid, label-free imaging techniques. Stimulated Raman scattering microscopy offers a three-dimensional, real-time imaging capability with chemical specificity. However, it can be difficult to differentiate between several constituents in tissues because their spectral characteristics can overlap. Furthermore, imaging speeds in previous multispectral stimulated Raman scattering imaging techniques were limited. Here, we demonstrate label-free imaging of tissues by 30 frames/s stimulated Raman scattering microscopy with frame-by-frame wavelength tunability. To produce multicolour images showing different constituents, spectral images were processed by modified independent component analysis, which can extract small differences in spectral features. We present various imaging modalities such as two-dimensional spectral imaging of rat liver, two-colour three-dimensional imaging of a vessel in rat liver, spectral imaging of several sections of intestinal villi in mouse, and in vivo spectral imaging of mouse ear skin.
abstract_cn: 迄今为止，组织的医学成像在很大程度上依赖于耗时的染色过程，因此需要快速，无标签的成像技术。受激拉曼散射显微镜可提供具有化学特异性的三维实时成像功能。但是，由于组织的光谱特性可能会重叠，因此很难区分组织中的几种成分。此外，以前的多光谱受激拉曼散射成像技术中的成像速度受到限制。在这里，我们演示了通过30帧/秒的刺激拉曼散射显微镜对组织进行无标签成像，并具有逐帧波长可调性。为了产生显示不同成分的多色图像，通过改进的独立成分分析对光谱图像进行处理，可以提取光谱特征中的细微差异。我们提出了各种成像方式，例如大鼠肝的二维光谱成像，大鼠肝中的血管的二维三色成像，小鼠肠绒毛的多个部分的光谱成像以及小鼠耳皮肤的体内光谱成像</ p>

title: Ultrafast X-ray pulse characterization at free-electron lasers
title_cn: 自由电子激光器的超快X射线脉冲表征
abstract: The ability to fully characterize ultrashort, ultra-intense X-ray pulses at free-electron lasers (FELs) will be crucial in experiments ranging from single-molecule imaging to extreme-timescale X-ray science. This issue is especially important at current-generation FELs, which are primarily based on self-amplified spontaneous emission and radiate with parameters that fluctuate strongly from pulse to pulse. Using single-cycle terahertz pulses from an optical laser, we have extended the streaking techniques of attosecond metrology to measure the temporal profile of individual FEL pulses with 5 fs full-width at half-maximum accuracy, as well as their arrival on a time base synchronized to the external laser to within 6 fs r.m.s. Optical laser-driven terahertz streaking can be utilized at any X-ray photon energy and is non-invasive, allowing it to be incorporated into any pump–probe experiment, eventually characterizing pulses before and after interaction with most sample environments.
abstract_cn: 在从单分子成像到极端时标X射线科学等实验中，自由电子激光器（FEL）完全表征超短，超强X射线脉冲的能力至关重要。在当前的FEL上，这个问题尤其重要，它们主要基于自放大的自发发射，并且辐射的参数会在脉冲之间剧烈波动。使用来自光学激光器的单周期太赫兹脉冲，我们扩展了阿秒计量学的划线技术，以半高精度将5＆＃160fs全宽度的单个FEL脉冲的时间轮廓及其到达与外部激光器同步的时基在6fs rms以内光学激光驱动的太赫兹条纹可以在任何X射线光子能量下使用，并且是非侵入性的，可以将其结合到任何泵浦探针实验中，最终表征与大多数样品环境相互作用之前和之后的脉冲。 >

title: Ultra-efficient ionization of heavy atoms by intense X-ray free-electron laser pulses
title_cn: X射线自由电子激光脉冲对重原子的超高效电离
abstract: X-ray free-electron lasers provide unique opportunities for exploring ultrafast dynamics and for imaging the structures of complex systems. Understanding the response of individual atoms to intense X-rays is essential for most free-electron laser applications. First experiments have shown that, for light atoms, the dominant interaction mechanism is ionization by sequential electron ejection, where the highest charge state produced is defined by the last ionic state that can be ionized with one photon. Here, we report an unprecedentedly high degree of ionization of xenon atoms by 1.5 keV free-electron laser pulses to charge states with ionization energies far exceeding the photon energy. Comparing ion charge-state distributions and fluorescence spectra with state-of-the-art calculations, we find that these surprisingly high charge states are created via excitation of transient resonances in highly charged ions, and predict resonance enhanced absorption to be a general phenomenon in the interaction of intense X-rays with systems containing high-Z constituents.
abstract_cn: X射线自由电子激光器为探索超快动力学和成像复杂系统的结构提供了独特的机会。对于大多数自由电子激光应用而言，了解单个原子对强X射线的响应至关重要。最初的实验表明，对于轻原子，主要的相互作用机理是通过顺序电子喷射进行电离，其中产生的最高电荷态由可以被一个光子电离的最后一个离子态所定义。在这里，我们报道了1.5keV自由电子激光脉冲对氙原子进行的前所未有的高度电离，从而使电离能远超过光子能的状态电荷化。将离子电荷状态分布和荧光光谱与最新技术的计算结果进行比较，我们发现这些令人惊讶的高电荷态是通过激发高电荷离子中的瞬态共振而产生的，并预测共振增强的吸收将是一种普遍现象。 X射线与包含高Z成分的系统的相互作用。

title: Strain-engineered artificial atom as a broad-spectrum solar energy funnel
title_cn: 应变工程人造原子作为广谱太阳能漏斗
abstract: An optoelectronic material with a spatially varying bandgap that is tunable is highly desirable for use in photovoltaics, photocatalysis and photodetection. Elastic strain has the potential to be used to achieve rapid and reversible tuning of the bandgap. However, as a result of plasticity or fracture, conventional materials cannot sustain a high enough elastic strain to create sufficient changes in their physical properties. Recently, an emergent class of materials—named ‘ultrastrength materials’—have been shown to avoid inelastic relaxation up to a significant fraction of their ideal strength. Here, we illustrate theoretically and computationally that elastic strain is a viable agent for creating a continuously varying bandgap profile in an initially homogeneous, atomically thin membrane. We propose that a photovoltaic device made from a strain-engineered MoS2 monolayer will capture a broad range of the solar spectrum and concentrate excitons or charge carriers.
abstract_cn: 具有在空间上可改变的带隙可调的光电子材料非常需要用于光伏，光催化和光检测。弹性应变有可能用于实现带隙的快速和可逆调整。然而，由于可塑性或断裂，常规材料不能维持足够高的弹性应变以在其物理性质中产生足够的变化。最近，已经显示出一种新兴的材料，称为“超强度材料”，可以避免非弹性松弛，直至其理想强度的很大一部分。在这里，我们从理论上和计算上说明，弹性应变是在初始均质的原子薄膜中产生连续变化的带隙分布的可行因素。我们建议，由应变工程MoS <sub> 2 </ sub>单层制成的光伏器件将捕获大范围的太阳光谱并集中激子或电荷载流子。</ p>
